FuncDef: This command enables BGP graceful restart helper procedures (the "receiving router" role defined in the standard) for address families included in the GR capabilities of both peers. SR OS can support GR helper functionality for IPv4, IPv6, VPN-IPv4, VPN-IPv6, Label-IPv4, Label-IPv6, L2-VPN, Route-Target (RTC), Flow-IPv4 (IPv4 flow-spec) and Flow-IPv6 (IPv6 flow-spec) routes.
